name: Doge Coin Clickers - Crypto Miner Sim Game
name_original: Doge Coin Clickers - Crypto Miner Sim Game
description:
Wow! Much Coin How Money So Crypto Very Currency

Doge Coin Clickers! Endless hours of Fun!

Become the Mining Master and generate millions of Doge Coins. You are the power behind the cryptocurrency mining of Doge Coins in this very simple but fun game.

-Mine as many Doge Coins as you can by clicking or tapping on a giant Doge Coin.
-Be the fastest miner in the pool
-Once you have enough coins head over to the shop to power up your rig and mine even faster.

Note: This is a simulation and no real currency is produced.
